name: BluetoothDevice.uuids
description: The BluetoothDevice.uuids read-only property listsÂ the UUIDs of GATT services provided by the device, that the current origin is allowed to access.
content:
Obsolete
This feature is obsolete. Although it may still work in some browsers, its use is discouraged since it could be removed at any time. Try to avoid using it.

Use BluetoothRemoteGATTServer.getPrimaryServices instead.

The BluetoothDevice.uuids read-only property liststhe UUIDs of GATT services provided by the device, that the current origin is allowed to access.
